LanguageData.WNA_ArtificialSoil.label: artificial soil
LanguageData.WNA_ArtificialSoil.description: Basic artificial soil, with special machines hiding beneath this soil can greatly boost plants' growth. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_FocusFloor.label: pale tile
LanguageData.WNA_FocusSand.label: dim sand
LanguageData.WNA_FocusSand.description: These sands have ran out of their color. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_FocusSoil.label: dim soil
LanguageData.WNA_FocusSoil.description: Dim colorless soil, vitality is pulsing through it. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_FocusSpring.label: pale spring
LanguageData.WNA_FocusSpring.description: Colorless fluid, seems to have some mysterious aspects. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
